Package com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.model

    Class Description
    Odp
    ODP (Ordine di Pagamento) Model Represents a payment order with all related information
    OdpAccountVDS
    Represents an Account/VDS in the ODP system.
    OdpAuthorizationFlow
    Represents the complete authorization flow for an ODP (Ordine di Pagamento).
    OdpAuthorizationStep
    Represents a single authorization step in an ODP (Ordine di Pagamento) workflow.
    OdpCDC
    Represents a CDC (Centro di Costo / Cost Center) in the ODP system.
    OdpCDR
    Represents a CDR (Centro di Ricavo / Revenue Center) in the ODP system.
    OdpCompany
    Represents a company in the ODP (Ordine di Pagamento) system.
    OdpCurrency
    Represents a currency in the ODP system.
    OdpSearchCriteria
    Search criteria for filtering ODPs (Ordine di Pagamento).
    OdpSortCriteria
    Sort criteria for ODP search results data grid.
    OdpSupplier
    Represents a supplier in the ODP system.
    OdpUser
    Represents a user in the ODP (Ordine di Pagamento) system.

Package com.rds_software.customers.menarini.projects.odp.model Description

Domain model classes for the ODP (Ordine di Pagamento) payment order system.

Overview

This package contains the core domain model representing payment orders and related entities. These POJOs (Plain Old Java Objects) are used throughout the application to transfer data between the presentation, service, and data access layers.

Core Domain Classes

Payment Order

  • Odp - Main payment order entity containing all payment details, state, and user associations

Users and Authorization

  • OdpUser - User with role representing a system user
  • OdpAuthorizationFlow - Complete authorization history for an ODP
  • OdpAuthorizationStep - Single approval/rejection step in the authorization workflow

Reference Data

  • OdpCompany - Company entity
  • OdpCurrency - Currency code and description
  • OdpSupplier - Supplier/vendor information
  • OdpCDC - Cost Center (Centro di Costo)
  • OdpCDR - Revenue Center (Centro di Ricavo)
  • OdpAccountVDS - Account/VDS entity

Search and Sorting

  • OdpSearchCriteria - Search filter criteria for finding ODPs
  • OdpSortCriteria - Sorting criteria for ODP result sets

Supporting Types

  • OdpCompanyType - Company type classification

Design Principles

Immutability

Some classes like OdpUser are designed as immutable objects with final fields, constructor initialization, and no setters. This ensures thread safety and prevents unintended modifications.

Null Safety

Domain classes use null to represent optional values. Callers should check for null before accessing nested properties.

Value Objects

Reference data classes (Company, Currency, Supplier, etc.) are value objects identified by their code. Two instances with the same code are considered equal.

Usage Examples

Creating an ODP


 Odp odp = new Odp();
 odp.setAzienda(new OdpCompany("001", "Menarini S.p.A."));
 odp.setValuta(new OdpCurrency("EUR", "Euro"));
 odp.setFornitore(new OdpSupplier("SUP001", "Acme Corp"));
 odp.setImporto(5000.00);
 odp.setDataEsecuzioneRichiesta(new Date());

Working with Authorization Flow


 OdpAuthorizationFlow flow = odpService.retrieveAuthorizationFlow(odpId);
 for (OdpAuthorizationStep step : flow.getSteps()) {
     System.out.println(step.getUser().getUserId() + " - " +
         (step.isApproved() ? "Approved" : "Rejected"));
 }

Building Search Criteria


 OdpSearchCriteria criteria = new OdpSearchCriteria();
 criteria.setCompany(company);
 criteria.setStates(Arrays.asList(OdpStateType.DRAFT, OdpStateType.WAITING_AUTH_SIGNER_1));
 criteria.setOwnerUserId(currentUser.getUserId());

 OdpSortCriteria sort = new OdpSortCriteria();
 sort.setColumn(OdpSearchResultColumnType.DATA_COMPILAZIONE);
 sort.setAscending(false);

 List<Odp> results = odpService.searchOdps(criteria, sort, 0, 50);
Version:
3.0
Author:
RDS Software
